database

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Search

  • public class Search
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains methods used in searching for houses.
    Version:
    1.48 (15.03.15)
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getLongLat(java.lang.String address)
      Takes a post code and returns a latitude and longitude.
      static java.sql.ResultSet getPostcodes()
      Gets all post codes in the database.
      static double haversine(double lat1, double lon1, double lat2, double lon2)
      From http://rosettacode.org/wiki/Haversine_formula#Java
      static java.util.ArrayList<House> price(int price, boolean filterType)
      Filters houses by price.
      static java.util.ArrayList<House> rooms(int rooms, boolean filterType)
      Filters houses by room number.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchProximity(java.lang.String postcode, int kilometers)
      Searches proximity in km entered by users (kilometers) between a reference post code (postcode) entered by the user and all postcodes in the database.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchString(java.lang.String userinput)
      The houses table runs on MyISAM engine and some columns have full text indexing allowing for quick string searching.
